todo.name: Should be able to change project type without having to reload the program to update visuals
Add number of assemblies when fetching price. Also add a plot for price vs number of units assembled
BoM only gets parts from one subsheet
Should be able to add sub requirements
Add errata to both projects and parts
In kanban remember last category when making new task
Dropdown menu arrow ugly as shit
To much spacing between tasks in Kanban
make project completion bar look better

prog.name: Kanban
prog.desc: have the kanban be configurable so that certain categories are only for certain project types

prog.name: BOM should display which subsheet each part belongs to
Add a weighted status/progress in kanban for progress
Progress in Kanban should be a slide bar with 10% increments
Fix symbol viewer
prog.desc: Arcs arent handled properly and many more issues

done.name: make project type in projects a drop down menu configurable in settings
done.desc: Should also then add a feature to sort by project type

done.name: Righht clicking and pinning project should put it on top
Add disk usage for each category in backups
Switching betwen projects is slow as shit
Make details for projects its own tab
done.desc: Also add number of parts in details

For PCBAs the "status metadata" should also have the option to input the main schematic file. read this and all subschematics in this file and implement it in other tools such as BoM etc

Somwhere should also be displayer number of subsheats and their name. Maybe add a project details folder?

done.name: Add a settings tab for backup settings and implement this
Add sort by number in projects search

done.desc: The kanban categories should be colored by the selected color in the setting menu

done.name: Add priority settigns to Kanban tasks
Is the pricing just a fucking RNG generator
All scopll bars are ugly as shit
